jhelp.util.preference
Class Preferences

java.lang.Object
  jhelp.util.preference.Preferences

public class Preferences
extends java.lang.Object

Store preferences in RAM and file.
A preference have a name, type and value.
Actual preferences type are describe in PreferenceType
The preferences file may not exists on first use, it will be created automatically when save is need

Author:
JHelp
